name: Ryan 🧜‍♀️🏳️‍⚧️ (@ryanhoulihan@mastodon.social)
summary:
Casual use of AMAB/AFAB/AGAB by cis people so they can investigate Trans people, and know as much about their bodies as possible, is driving me insane. STOP. A little knowledge is very dangerous and that’s all many of you have: A LITTLE. That’s not what those terms were created for.

There’s exceedingly few times it’s appropriate to bring up. You don’t need to know that – and it’s weird and invalidating that you want to. Are you a doctor? Is that information relevant? Is that information yours?
